actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The manticore makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks, or it makes two Tail Spike attacks. If both Tail Spike attacks hit one creature, the target must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail Spike
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, range 100/200 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.

reactions.name: Spiky Retaliation
reactions.desc: When a creature the manticore can see hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it, the manticore can jab a spike into the attacker. The attacker must succeed on a DC 13 DEX save or take 5 (2d4) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Mimicry
special_abilities.desc: The manticore can mimic Humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 13 WIS (Insight) check.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The manticore is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.

special_abilities.name: Tail Spike Regrowth
special_abilities.desc: The manticore has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the manticore finishes a long rest.
